title: Tomorrow We Won't Be Friends For Sure, Right?
alternative_title: Ashita wa Kitto Tomodachi Janal, Yone ; 明日はきっと友だちじゃない、よね
status: Ashita wa Kitto Tomodachi Janal, Yone ; 明日はきっと友だちじゃない、よね
description:
Description :
        High school students Akari and Mikage have been childhood friends since kindergarten. Akari has always had a crush on Mikage, but he doesn't tell him how he feels. He wanted to support his love for his popular Mikage. However, Mikage, who was confessed to by a girl, refuses and says "I can't because I have someone I like."
